<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106657</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106657</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085881</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Resources for looking at art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebsmittel für das Betrachten von von kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressources pour regarder l'art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recursos para olhar a arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorse per guardare arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς για την εξέταση την τέχνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recursos para mirar arte</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A guide to some of the best websites, activities, and print resources for building visual literacy through the study of art.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Anleitung zu einigen der besten Web site, 
der Aktivitäten und der Druckbetriebsmittel für 
Gebäudesichtbildungsgrad durch die Studie der kunst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un guide de certains des meilleurs sites Web, 
activités, et ressources d'impression pour l'instruction visuelle de 
bâtiment par l'étude de l'art.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma guia a alguns dos mais melhores Web site, 
atividades, e recursos da cópia para o literacy visual do edifício 
com o estudo da arte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una guida ad alcune dei Web site, delle attività
e delle risorse della stampa migliori per literacy visivo della 
costruzione con lo studio su arte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας οδηγός για μερικούς από τους καλύτερους 
ιστοχώρους, τις δραστηριότητες, και τις έντυπες πηγές για την 
οικοδόμηση της οπτικής βασικής εκπαίδευσης μέσω της μελέτης της 
τέχνης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una guía a algunos de los mejores Web site, 
actividades, y recursos de la impresión para la instrucción visual 
del edificio con el estudio del arte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MELISSA THIBAULT
FN:MELISSA THIBAULT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106657</entry>
